## ProgressIndicatorGroup() function

Allows to specify progress indicator group for displaying local progress indicator

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ProgressIndicatorGroup(name: string): (_target: RESTClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: AdditionalInfoPropertyDescriptor<LocalProgressIndicatorName> & RestMethodMiddlewares) => AdditionalInfoPropertyDescriptor<LocalProgressIndicatorName> & RestMethodMiddlewares;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of progress indicator group to be displayed |
